fees.conditions: Cabin allowance depends on fare: Economy includes 0 to 1 hand baggage (fare-dependent) + 1 small bag; maximum total weight 12 kg; small bag dimensions 40 x 30 x 15 cm; hand baggage max dimensions 55 x 35 x 25 cm
Hand Baggage option (Basic fare only); rates are displayed during purchase and in My Bookings; can be purchased up to 4 hours before departure

Additional Baggage option (extra bag up to 158 cm total dimensions; weight limit depends on cabin); rates are displayed during purchase and in My Bookings; discounted rate when purchased online at least 24 hours before departure (except flights from/to Canada and USA where online price is the same as airport)
fees.applies_to: All fares (where additional bags are permitted)
fees.timing: at booking / manage booking / online check-in

fees.conditions: Oversized Baggage option applies to bags over 158 cm and up to 300 cm total dimensions; price depends on itinerary and must be paid at the airport
Overweight Baggage option applies to bags heavier than the allowance in the ticket up to 32 kg; price depends on itinerary and must be paid at the airport; bags over 32 kg must be handled via cargo

Advance seat selection pricing varies by destination, travel dates, and fare; Economy Light fares can select only paid seats until check-in closes; otherwise seats are auto-assigned at check-in (30 hours before departure)

Standard seat selection is free for: Flying Blue Silver/Gold/Platinum (and companions on same booking), passengers with reduced mobility, children traveling alone, and passengers traveling on a Flex fare
Change and cancellation terms depend on the fare conditions of the ticket; fare difference may apply
Kids Solo service fares vary by child age and itinerary (domestic vs international age eligibility applies)
